imdb.plot outline: Coffee and Cream is a new and refreshing TV show featuring Conversation, Travel, Wellness and Empowerment. The show will have delightful and engaging interviews and segments with a wide range of guests and topics from all walks of life both locally and globally. Hosts Richard and Crystal McCorkell are the founders of The ReConnect Live, a multimedia broadcast collective based out of Raleigh, NC.
imdb.title: Coffee & Cream
